div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2213 Selinunte, 1874 (948) Burial: c. 240-235 B.C. (Robinson) Contents: 9 AR. From excavations Libyans: 9 double-shekels (Zeus/bull) Disposition: Palermo Cavallari, BullCommAntSic 7 (1874), p. 18; NSc 1877, p. 132 Gabrici, NC 1931, pp. 88-90, illus. Robinson, NC 1943, pp. 6-8 Tusa Cutroni, AIIN 1956, p. 207 no. IX; Koka- los 1961, p. 153, illus.
